metadata.source: two editions: 1. Isadi nau upanisad. Ed. by Harikrsnadas Goendaka. (Gorakhpur : Gita Press, 2038 samvat), 2. Sri Sri Sruti-ratna-mala. Ed. by Bhakti Sudhakar. (Dhaka : 'Manjusa Printing Works) n.d.

body.text: auṃ / saha nāv avatu / saha nau bhunaktu / saha vīryaṃ karavāvahai / tejasvi nāv adhītam astu / mā vidviṣāvahai /

children.text: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ brahma kutaḥ sma jātā
[*1] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 11.1.
[*2] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 11.2.
[*3] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 11.3
[*4] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 11.4, 5.14, and Rigveda 5.81.1.
[*5] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 11.5 and Rigveda 10.13.1.
na tasya rogo na jarā na mṛtyuḥ
pūrvo ha jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ
ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
eko hi rudro na dvitīyāya tasthur
[*7] This mantra is also found in Yajurveda 17.19 and Rigveda 10.82.3.
vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas
ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
sa vetti vedyaṃ na ca tasyāsti vettā
vi caiti cānte viśvam ādau sa devaḥ
yas taṃ na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati
ya it tad vidus ta ime samāsate [*18]
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yac ca vedā vadanti
yasminn idam saṃ ca vicaiti sarvam
ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
yadātamas tan na divā na rātrir
na san na cāsac chiva eva kevalaḥ
mā nas toke tanaye mā na āyuṣi
mā no goṣu mā na aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ
kṣaraṃ tv avidyā hy amṛtaṃ tu vidyā
ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ yas tam agre
sarvā diśa ūrdhvam adhaś ca tiryak
ye pūrvaṃ devā ṛṣayaś ca tad vidus
na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate
na tasya kaścit patir asti loke
na ceśitā naiva ca tasya liṅgam
na cāsya kaścij janitā na cādhipaḥ
na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
yo vai vedāṃś ca prahiṇoti tasmai

oṃ saha nāv avatu saha nau bhunaktu saha vīryaṃ karavāvahai
tejasvi nāvadhītam astu mā vidviṣāvahai
